name: 10! Impossible Merge Challenge
description:
10! Impossible Merge Challenge is an addictive puzzle game witch you merge 3 or more hexa blocks to get higher value block numbers. Start to merge from ‘1’ to reach to reach the goal ’10’. Challenge yourself with this fun, addicting, number merge puzzle game since most of the people are impossible to make it 10.

** 4 Difficulty modes to challenge **
+ Casual Mode : 6x6 Board and merge 3 or more blocks
+ Easy Mode : 5x5 Board and merge 3 or more blocks
+ Hard Mode : 5x5 Board and merge 4 or more blocks
+ Impossible Mode : 4x4 Board and merge 4 or more blocks
